geonode.groups.templatetags.groups_tags
=======================================

.. py:module:: geonode.groups.templatetags.groups_tags


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   geonode.groups.templatetags.groups_tags.register


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: register

.. py:function:: group_profile_image(group_profile, css_classes='', size=None)

   Returns an HTML img tag with the input group_profiles's logo.

   If the group profile does not have an associated logo, a stock image is
   used.
